sections.title: With placeholder
sections.content: Display a hint inside the textarea to guide users on what to enter.
examples: <flux:textarea label="Order notes" placeholder="No lettuce, tomato, or onion..."/>

sections.title: Fixed row height
sections.content: Customize the height of the textarea by passing a rows prop.

sections.title: Auto-sizing textarea
sections.content:
Using CSS's new field-sizing property, the textarea will automatically adjust its height to fit the content by passing in the rows="auto" prop.
This feature is not available in all web browsers. Visit caniuse.com to see which browsers support this feature.

sections.title: Configure resize
sections.content: If you want to restrict the user from resizing the textarea, you can use the resize="none" prop.
